mapper.insert: insert into lecture(lec_id, blocks_url, lec_url, lec_name, classfy, mid_classfy, teachers, org_name, enroll_start, enroll_end, audit_yn, image, short_dsc, hidden, language_name) values(#{lecId}, #{blocksUrl}, #{lecUrl}, #{lecName}, #{classfy}, #{midClassfy}, #{teachers}, #{orgName}, #{enrollStart}, #{enrollEnd}, #{auditYn}, #{image}, #{shortDsc}, #{hidden}, #{languageName})
mapper.select: select lec_id, blocks_url, lec_url, lec_name, classfy, mid_classfy, teachers, org_name, enroll_start, enroll_end, audit_yn, image, short_dsc, hidden, language_name from lecture order by enroll_end desc limit 20

SELECT lec.* FROM ( select lec_id, blocks_url, lec_url, lec_name, classfy, mid_classfy, teachers, org_name, enroll_start, enroll_end, audit_yn, image, short_dsc, hidden, language_name from lecture order by enroll_end desc) lec limit #{start}, #{recordsPerPage}

select lec_id, blocks_url, lec_url, lec_name, classfy, mid_classfy, teachers, org_name, enroll_start, enroll_end, audit_yn, image, short_dsc, hidden, language_name from lecture where mid_classfy=#{category} order by enroll_end desc limit 20

select lec_id, blocks_url, lec_url, lec_name, classfy, mid_classfy, teachers, org_name, enroll_start, enroll_end, audit_yn, image, short_dsc, hidden, language_name from lecture where lec_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT lec.* FROM ( select lec_id, blocks_url, lec_url, lec_name, classfy, mid_classfy, teachers, org_name, enroll_start, enroll_end, audit_yn, image, short_dsc, hidden, language_name from lecture where lec_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')) lec limit #{start}, #{recordsPerPage}
select count(*) from study_group where lec_id=#{lecId} and use_yn='y'
select count(*) from lecture where mid_classfy=#{category}
select count(*) from lecture where lec_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
